Our insurance call center is the do-it-all, won’t-let-you-down, always-available communication platform that helps you leverage hidden opportunities to grow your business, exceed customer expectations, and provide actionable data – all simultaneously!

Product & Service Updates? We Provide Your Insurance Call Center Concise, Confident Communication

Change is a constant in the insurance industry. From product and service enhancements to varying rates, keeping your customers in the loop is as important as providing top-notch insurance. With TeleDirect’s agile, powerful call center, your firm will remain ahead of the curve on critical communication avenues, including:

  • Rate changes: From fee reductions to bumps in coverage costs, TeleDirect gets the message out with accurate, timely outbound calls.
  • Service updates: If your insurance coverage changes, it helps to keep your clients in the know. We’ll help you navigate the sometimes-tricky world of service update communications, and ensure your insurance coverage meets client expectations.
  • Insurance renewal periods: Keep your profits on track with TeleDirect’s timely outbound calls to remind all your clients about upcoming renewal information. Don’t let service lapses derail your client’s confidence – stay current with our scripted communications, live agent support, and more.
  • Auto-draft payment communication
  • Health insurance messaging: From social media to text messaging, nobody beats TeleDirect with insurance messaging.
  • Life insurance rebates, distributions, etc.: Insurance distributions require a clear understanding of which funds are applied to certain coverage tiers. Our insurance call center tools enable on-point, accurate communication.
  • Combined insurance discounts (auto and home, life and auto, etc.)
  • And much more

Whatever you need, TeleDirect is here to help. We take care of our customers – your insurance call center – so you can concentrate on your own customers!

TeleDirect invests in your company’s customer service platform – and in return, your own customers will notice additional value and commitment on a daily basis. With our call center platform, your insurance services have a decided advantage over the competition.
